questions.question_text_1: THIS IS QUESTION PAPER FOR THE SUBJECT "DIPLOMA LEVEL : MODERN APPLICATION DEVELOPMENT I (COMPUTER BASED EXAM)" ARE YOU SURE YOU HAVE TO WRITE EXAM FOR THIS SUBJECT? questions.question_text_1: You have a DRAM module with bus width of 64 bits, clock speed of 800 MHz, and operating in DDR (double-data-rate or two values per clock cycle) mode. What is the maximum memory bandwidth in Gigabytes per second achievable with this module if it is working in dual channel mode (two memory interfaces are used)?
question_texts: You have a DRAM module with bus width of 64 bits, clock speed of 800 MHz, and operating in DDR (double-data-rate or two values per clock cycle) mode. What is the maximum memory bandwidth in Gigabytes per second achievable with this module if it is working in dual channel mode (two memory interfaces are used)?

questions.question_text_1: Consider the following HTML document “form.html” and the flask route given in “app.py”. Assume all the required methods are imported, Which of the following statements is/are correct.

The above HTML document has only backend validation incorporated.
The above HTML document has both frontend and backend validationincorporated.

questions.question_text_1: Consider a character set Q, which consists of only those characters used in the sentence, "the five boxing wizards jump quickly" If this sentence is to be saved in a document with minimum encoding, what will be the size of the document given that no other information or context is to be saved?
question_texts: Consider a character set Q, which consists of only those characters used in the sentence, "the five boxing wizards jump quickly" If this sentence is to be saved in a document with minimum encoding, what will be the size of the document given that no other information or context is to be saved?

options.option_text: 175 bits
180 bits
252 bits
256 bits

questions.question_text_1: We are trying to create two models ‘Student’ and ‘Assignment’ and they are related by one-to-many relationship(i.e., one student will attempt multiple assignments). Assuming that flask_sqlalchemy is to be used to create data models, which of the following will correctly achieve the requirements?

questions.question_text_1: Consider the following statements and select the correct option. Statement 1: Redundancy is used to improve performance and decrease server load. Statement 2: Replication ensures data is not lost if a copy gets destroyed.
question_texts: Consider the following statements and select the correct option. Statement 1: Redundancy is used to improve performance and decrease server load. Statement 2: Replication ensures data is not lost if a copy gets destroyed.

options.option_text: Statement 1 is true & statement 2 is false
Statement 2 is true & statement 1 is false
Both statements 1 and 2 are true
Both statements 1 and 2 are false

questions.question_text_1: The term “stateless” in the context of a server means that _________
question_texts: The term “stateless” in the context of a server means that _________

options.option_text: it is not physically located on any particular machine
it does not have any information about the state of the client
it is ephemeral
All of these
